item.description:
NOTE: THIS EVENT HAS BEEN POSTPONED AND WILL BE REBOOKED FOR LATE JAN OR EARLY FEB. PLEASE WATCH THE CALENDAR AND/OR YOUR EMAIL INBOX FOR NEW DETAILS!


Please join us for a special potluck and meetup on the topic of alternative and natural building options that are healthy and affordable. Our permaculture friend Noah Wentworth of Evergreen Building Collaborative will be taking us on a slideshow/tour of all the different options and, based on what we learn, we can organize some hands-on sessions for Spring or see who wants to help each other on personal projects....

This meetup is based on the idea submitted by Max J so we hope to cover things like strawbale, cob, cordwood, tipis, yurts, yomes, domes, etc. as well as start a discussion of how we work together on some of these.

More details to be posted soon. Portland Location TBD.

6:30 Potluck (bring potluck kit and dish/beverage to share)
7:00 Announcements + Presentation + Discussion
8:30 Wrap-up, etc.

PS: As this is pretty much the solstice, feel free to bring any samples of the home-/brewed/fermented-beverage persuasion to share and/or swap!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Intro to Alternative/Natural Shelter Construction
